Class ChatBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • ChatBot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChatBot

    public class ChatBot
extends java.lang.Object
implements IChatBot
    Performs the majority of back end processing and communicates between GUI (front end) and data stores.

      • executeAction

        public Response executeAction(UserInput input)
        TODO complete
        Specified by:
        executeAction in interface IChatBot
        Parameters:
        input - UserInput object form the GUI, which will be used to discern the intent and any Stock or Sector names that form part of the query.
        Returns:
        Response object.

      • stockSummary

        public Response stockSummary()
        Generates a report detailing - Favourite stocks - Favourite Sectors - Any major changes in stocks or sectors. The report may also include NewsArticles relevant to the favourite stocks and major changes. This report will be returned to the GUI as a Response object, which the GUI will parse and display.
        Returns:
        Response object containing a custom String and a custom NewsFeed object.

      • checkMajorChanges

        public Response checkMajorChanges()
        Checks which stocks and sectors have had major price changes in the recent history
        Returns:
        Response object containing the names of stocks and sectors with major changes

        Retrieves the latest stock data and adds it to the database
